response.original_title: When Calls the Heart: My Heart Is Yours
response.overview: From celebrated author Janette Oke comes a rigorous and romantic adventure as epic as the wide frontier. Erin Krakow, Daniel Lissing, Jack Wagner and Lori Loughlin star in When Calls the Heart: My Heart Is Yours. Jack and Elizabeth's big day is closer than ever before, but complications may put their plans and dreams in serious jeopardy. Meanwhile, Abigail and Pastor Frank must resolve their own future together, and Bill comes to the aid of a young girl with a mystery to solve.
response.title: When Calls the Heart: My Heart Is Yours
